about_the_game:
18 Year Pure Sweet Loli is an anime table pet game!

Operating instructions:

  • Hold down the left mouse button and drag.

  • use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out.

  • You can select body shape by right clicking on the small icon in the bottom right corner.

The content includes:

After purchase, you can get a cute cartoon anime girl desktop pet and an interactive action

Solution for turning the background black and unable to see the desktop:

Win7 system:

Click on the system icon in the bottom left corner of the desktop - Control Panel - System and Security - System - Advanced System Settings - Advanced - Performance - Settings, check [Aero] and [Transparent Glass], then click [Adjust to Best Appearance], and then click [OK]

Win10 system:

Open the DVIDIA Control Panel - Manage 3D Settings, find Multi Frame Sampling AA (MFAA) and Smooth Processing FXAA, and change these two options to Off

If the above methods still cannot solve the problem, please try the following general methods:

1. Restart the computer

2. Turn off game Filter

3. Right click on the desktop mouse - Personalize - Colors - Enable Transparency Effect

4. Go to the graphics card official website to download the latest graphics card driver. During the installation process, select "Custom Installation">check "Clean Installation". Default overlay upgrade installation cannot be used
detailed_description:
18 Year Pure Sweet Loli is an anime table pet game!

Operating instructions:

  • Hold down the left mouse button and drag.

  • use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out.

  • You can select body shape by right clicking on the small icon in the bottom right corner.

The content includes:

After purchase, you can get a cute cartoon anime girl desktop pet and an interactive action

Solution for turning the background black and unable to see the desktop:

Win7 system:

Click on the system icon in the bottom left corner of the desktop - Control Panel - System and Security - System - Advanced System Settings - Advanced - Performance - Settings, check [Aero] and [Transparent Glass], then click [Adjust to Best Appearance], and then click [OK]

Win10 system:

Open the DVIDIA Control Panel - Manage 3D Settings, find Multi Frame Sampling AA (MFAA) and Smooth Processing FXAA, and change these two options to Off

If the above methods still cannot solve the problem, please try the following general methods:

1. Restart the computer

2. Turn off game Filter

3. Right click on the desktop mouse - Personalize - Colors - Enable Transparency Effect

4. Go to the graphics card official website to download the latest graphics card driver. During the installation process, select "Custom Installation">check "Clean Installation". Default overlay upgrade installation cannot be used
name: 18 Year Pure Sweet Loli

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Is playing games alone too lonely? Come and try the anime soft sister table pet. Here, your desktop will no longer be monotonous, but become a lovely little world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Romanian, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Korean, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Polish, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Finnish, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic
